languages.text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан". {n}Вигдис замолкает на несколько секунд, и вокс улавливает скрип когито-пера и шорох бумаг.{/n} "Сервочереп-гонец направлен в отсек служителей Омниссии. Как только данные расшифруют, я немедленно доложу вам".

traits.locale_text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан". {n}Вигдис замолкает на несколько секунд, и вокс улавливает скрип когито-пера и шорох бумаг.{/n} "Сервочереп-гонец направлен в отсек служителей Омниссии. Как только данные расшифруют, я немедленно доложу вам".

languages.text: "Yes, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with scratchings of a cogita-quill and rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah's servants' compartment. Once the data has been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."
languages.original_text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан". {n}Вигдис замолкает на несколько секунд, и вокс улавливает скрип когито-пера и шорох бумаг.{/n} "Сервочереп-гонец направлен в отсек служителей Омниссии. Как только данные расшифруют, я немедленно доложу вам".

traits.locale_text: "Aye aye, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with the scratching of the cogito-quill and the rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah servants' compartment. Once the data has been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."

"Aye aye, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with the scratching of the cogito-quill and the rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah servants' compartment. Once the data has been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."

"Aye aye, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with scratchings of a cogita-quill and rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah servants' compartment. Once the data have been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."

"Aye aye, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with scratchings of a cogita-quill and rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah servants' compartment. Once the data have been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."

"Yes, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with scratchings of a cogita-quill and rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah's servants' compartment. Once the data has been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人。”{n}维格迪斯陷入了沉默，随后音阵系统中传来了羽毛笔的刮擦声，以及纸张的沙沙声。{/n}“信使伺服头骨已经送到了欧姆尼塞亚仆人的船舱里。待数据解密完成之后，我会立刻通知您。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with scratchings of a cogita-quill and rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah's servants' compartment. Once the data has been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人。”{n}维格迪斯陷入了沉默，随后音阵系统中传来了羽毛笔的刮擦声，以及纸张的沙沙声。{/n}“信使伺服头骨已经送到了欧姆尼塞亚仆人的船舱里。待数据解密完成之后，我会立刻通知您。”

languages.text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Vigdis se tait et la transmission-vox n'émet plus que des bruits de cogitaplume et de froissements de papier.{/n} « Un servocrâne messager a été envoyé dans les quartiers des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. Je vous préviendrai dès que les données auront été décodées. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with scratchings of a cogita-quill and rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah's servants' compartment. Once the data has been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Vigdis se tait et la transmission-vox n'émet plus que des bruits de cogitaplume et de froissements de papier.{/n} « Un servocrâne messager a été envoyé dans les quartiers des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. Je vous préviendrai dès que les données auront été décodées. »

languages.text: «A la orden, Lord Capitán». {n}Vigdis se queda en silencio y la transmisión de voco reproduce los rasgueos de una cogitapluma y el crujido de papeles.{/n} «Se ha enviado un servocráneo mensajero al compartimento de los sirvientes del Omnissiah. Le avisaré una vez se hayan desencriptado los datos».
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with scratchings of a cogita-quill and rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah's servants' compartment. Once the data has been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."

traits.locale_text: «A la orden, Lord Capitán». {n}Vigdis se queda en silencio y la transmisión de voco reproduce los rasgueos de una cogitapluma y el crujido de papeles.{/n} «Se ha enviado un servocráneo mensajero al compartimento de los sirvientes del Omnissiah. Le avisaré una vez se hayan desencriptado los datos».

languages.text: 「はい、ロード・キャプテン」{n}ヴィグディスが沈黙すると、ヴォクス通信は自律式羽ペンの引っかく音と紙の擦れる音で満たされた。{/n}「使者のサーヴォスカルが万機神の従者用コンパートメントに送られました。データが解読され次第、直ちにお知らせします」
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with scratchings of a cogita-quill and rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah's servants' compartment. Once the data has been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."

traits.locale_text: 「はい、ロード・キャプテン」{n}ヴィグディスが沈黙すると、ヴォクス通信は自律式羽ペンの引っかく音と紙の擦れる音で満たされた。{/n}「使者のサーヴォスカルが万機神の従者用コンパートメントに送られました。データが解読され次第、直ちにお知らせします」

languages.text: "Jawohl, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis verstummt und die Voxübertragung wird gestört von dem Gekratze einer Cogita-Feder und dem Rascheln von Papier.{/n} "Ein Boten-Servoschädel wurde in das Abteil der Diener des Omnissiah geschickt. Sobald die Daten entschlüsselt sind, werde ich Euch umgehend benachrichtigen."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with scratchings of a cogita-quill and rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah's servants' compartment. Once the data has been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."

traits.locale_text: "Aye, aye, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis verstummt und die Voxübertragung wird gestört von dem Gekratze einer Cogita-Feder und dem Rascheln von Papier.{/n} "Ein Boten-Servoschädel wurde in das Abteil der Diener des Omnissiah geschickt. Sobald die Daten entschlüsselt sind, werde ich Euch umgehend benachrichtigen."

"Aye, aye, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis verstummt und die Voxübertragung wird gestört von dem Gekratze einer Cogita-Feder und dem Rascheln von Papier.{/n} "Ein Boten-Servoschädel wurde in das Abteil der Diener des Omnissiah geschickt. Sobald die Daten entschlüsselt sind, werde ich Euch umgehend benachrichtigen."

languages.text: "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan." {n}Vigdis susuyor, ardından bir kavramyazarın karalama sesleri ve kâğıt hışırtıları geliyor.{/n} "Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarının kompartımanına bir hizmelet gönderildi. Verinin şifresi çözüldüğünde sizi derhâl bilgilendireceğim."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis falls silent, and the vox-transmission fills with scratchings of a cogita-quill and rustling of papers.{/n} "A messenger servo-skull has been sent to the Omnissiah's servants' compartment. Once the data has been decrypted, I will notify you immediately."
